snippet.title: 17 Best Depression iPhone & Android Apps of 2013
snippet.description: * 17 Best Depression iPhone & Android Apps of 2013 For those moments when you're feeling particularly depressed, these 17 apps can help by offering information or a smile when you need it most.

snippet.title: The Best Breast Cancer iPhone & Android Apps of 2013
snippet.description: * The Best Breast Cancer iPhone & Android Apps of 2013 If you or a loved one has breast cancer, you’ll want to know all you can about this treatable disease. Many of these apps are free and offer great information.

snippet.title: The 13 Best Diabetes iPhone & Android Apps of 2013
snippet.description: * The 13 Best Diabetes iPhone & Android Apps of 2013 With rapidly rising diabetes rates, managing this condition is more important than ever. Check out these 13 apps to get a better handle on your blood sugar.

snippet.title: The 11 Best Healthy Lifestyle iPhone and Android Apps of 2013
snippet.description: * The 11 Best Healthy Lifestyle iPhone and Android Apps of 2013 Learn more about 11 mobile apps that can help you have a healthy, happy lifestyle everyday.

snippet.title: The 11 Best Quit Smoking iPhone & Android Apps of 2013
snippet.description: * The 11 Best Quit Smoking iPhone & Android Apps of 2013 While smoking cessation apps are not miracle workers, these apps are filled with tips and tricks to aid you in your journey towards becoming a former smoker.

snippet.title: Apps That Can Save Your Life
snippet.description: * Apps That Can Save Your Life These smartphone apps help people with food allergies avoid potentially dangerous foods or get treatment faster in the event of accidental exposure.

snippet.title: The 12 Best Crohn’s Disease iPhone & Android Apps of 2013
snippet.description: * The 12 Best Crohn’s Disease iPhone & Android Apps of 2013 Thanks to advances in technology, Crohn’s disease sufferers have new ways to occupy their bathroom time by popping open an app on their Apple or Android device.

snippet.title: Super Bowl 2011: Healthy Snack Ideas
snippet.description: * Super Bowl 2011: Healthy Snack Ideas Super Bowl Sunday could easily be renamed Super Snack Sunday.
